name: trans Slack Bot demo
description: A translation bot for Slack that translates a message when a user reacted with an emoji (The specifications are based on reacjilator: https://github.com/slackAPI/reacjilator). This bot also gather paper information from arXiv with translation.

TEXTRA_KEY.description: TexTra API key, see https://mt-auto-minhon-mlt.ucri.jgn-x.jp/content/setting/user/edit/ after login

TEXTRA_SECRET.description: TexTra API secret, see https://mt-auto-minhon-mlt.ucri.jgn-x.jp/content/setting/user/edit/ after login

TEXTRA_CUSTOME_ENGINE.description: Custome translation engine for specific lang pair, enter '[src_lang]_[tgt_lang],[engine_name]' with a pipe as delimiter for custome engines (ex. 'en_ja,c-xxxx|ja_en,c-xxxx')

ARXIV_CHECK_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for posting paper from arXiv (ex. 'Cxxxxxxxx'), you can overwrite this value by URL parameter 'post_channel'

ARXIV_CHECK_KEYWORD.description: Keyword for searching paper from arXiv (ex. 'neural machine translation'), you can overwrite this value by URL parameter 'keyword'

ARXIV_CHECK_FROM_DAYS_BEFORE.description: Searching start date (in days from now, default value is '7'), you can overwrite this value by URL parameter 'from_days_before'

ARXIV_CHECK_TO_DAYS_BEFORE.description: Searching end date (in days from now, default value is '6'), you can overwrite this value by URL parameter 'to_days_before'

ARXIV_CHECK_AVOID_DUPLICATED_POSTING.description: Suppress duplicated posting (while heroku dyno is alive, default value is 'ON'), you can overwrite this value by URL parameter 'avoid_duplicated_posting'

ARXIV_CHECK_TRANS.description: Translation target language code ('ja' for Japanese, 'none' for no translation, default value is 'ja'), you can overwrite this value by URL parameter 'trans_tgt_lang'
